description: At Italian Restaurant, we offer classic Italian dishes with fresh ingredients. Enjoy our traditional pasta and grilled steak.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, our main courses are crafted with care.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A photo of a traditional lasagna, baked to perfection, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A beautiful image of tagliata di manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A delicious creamy risotto ai funghi, with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan at Italian Restaurant.
